Name: Yellow Negroni
Ingredients: 22.5 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
22.5 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
POUR all ingredients into chilled glass.
Fill glass with ice and briefly stir.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: As the name suggests, this pisco-based, five equal parts, vivid yellow bittersweet aperitif was inspired by the classic Negroni and three of the world's most iconic yellow liqueurs: limoncello, gentian and Chartreuse Jaune.
History: Created 21st January 2017 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Yellow Negroni contains 196 calories
